articles.title: –Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é –ø–æ-–Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏ + —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

–ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ –≤—ã –∏–∑—É—á–∞–µ—Ç–µ –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫ –¥–ª—è –ª—é–±–∏–º–æ–≥–æ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞, –µ—Å—Ç—å –æ–¥–Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –Ω–µ–≥–æ —Ü–µ–ª—ã–π –º–∏—Ä: **"–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é."** –ù–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏–π ‚Äî –ø—Ä—è–º–æ–π –∏ –∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫, –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ –∑–≤—É—á–∏—Ç –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Ç–µ–ø–ª–æ.

–î–∞–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º –≤—Å–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±—ã —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å "–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é" –ø–æ-–Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏.

## –ì–ª–∞–≤–Ω–∞—è —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞: Ik hou van je

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Ik hou van je"
  translation="–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ —Ö–∞—É –≤–∞–Ω –π–µ"
  context="–°–∞–º—ã–π —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ë–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏ –∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–± —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å '–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é'."
/>

–≠—Ç–æ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–∞. **Ik hou van je** ‚Äî –≥–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ –Ω–∞ –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–æ–º. –ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ –≤—ã —Å–∫–∞–∂–µ—Ç–µ —ç—Ç–æ —Å–≤–æ–µ–º—É –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–æ–º—É –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä—É, –≤—ã –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç—å –æ—Ç –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–∞.

## –í–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã "–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é"

<VocabCard
  word="Ik hou van jou"
  translation="–Ø –ª—é–±–ª—é –¢–ï–ë–Ø (—Å –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º)"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ —Ö–∞—É –≤–∞–Ω —è—É"
  example="Ik hou van jou, niet van iemand anders."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ik houd van je"
  translation="–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é (—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ)"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ —Ö–∞—É—Ç –≤–∞–Ω –π–µ"
  example="–û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –æ—Ä—Ñ–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏—è, –Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç—Å—è —Ç–∞–∫ –∂–µ."
/>

<CultureTip title="Je vs Jou" flag="üá≥üá±">
"Je" ‚Äî –±–µ–∑—É–¥–∞—Ä–Ω–∞—è —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞, "jou" ‚Äî —É–¥–∞—Ä–Ω–∞—è. "Ik hou van je" ‚Äî –æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ. "Ik hou van JOU" ‚Äî —Å –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º: "–Ø –ª—é–±–ª—é –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –¢–ï–ë–Ø". –í —Ä–µ—á–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω–∏—Ü–∞ –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–æ–Ω–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
</CultureTip>

## –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ª–æ–≤ –æ –ª—é–±–≤–∏

<VocabCard
  word="Liefde"
  translation="–õ—é–±–æ–≤—å"
  pronunciation="–ª–∏—Ñ–¥–µ"
  example="Liefde is het mooiste wat er is."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Verliefd"
  translation="–í–ª—é–±–ª—ë–Ω–Ω—ã–π"
  pronunciation="—Ñ–µ—Ä–ª–∏—Ñ—Ç"
  example="Ik ben verliefd op je."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Houden van"
  translation="–õ—é–±–∏—Ç—å (–≥–ª–∞–≥–æ–ª)"
  pronunciation="—Ö–∞—É–¥–µ–Ω –≤–∞–Ω"
  example="Ik zal altijd van je houden."
/>

## –ì–ª–∞–≥–æ–ª "Houden van" ‚Äî –õ—é–±–∏—Ç—å

–ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø—Ä—è–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –≥–ª–∞–≥–æ–ª–∞ –ø–æ–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –≤–∞–º –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤–∞:

<ConjugationTable
  verb="Houden van"
  meaning="–ª—é–±–∏—Ç—å"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "Ik (–Ø)", word: "hou(d) van", translation: "—è –ª—é–±–ª—é" },
    { person: "Jij/Je (–¢—ã)", word: "houdt van", translation: "—Ç—ã –ª—é–±–∏—à—å" },
    { person: "Hij/Zij (–û–Ω/–û–Ω–∞)", word: "houdt van", translation: "–æ–Ω/–æ–Ω–∞ –ª—é–±–∏—Ç" },
    { person: "Wij (–ú—ã)", word: "houden van", translation: "–º—ã –ª—é–±–∏–º" },
    { person: "Jullie (–í—ã)", word: "houden van", translation: "–≤—ã –ª—é–±–∏—Ç–µ" },
    { person: "Zij (–û–Ω–∏)", word: "houden van", translation: "–æ–Ω–∏ –ª—é–±—è—Ç" }
  ]}
/>

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞—Ü–∏–∏

### "–Ø –æ—á–µ–Ω—å —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é"

<VocabCard
  word="Ik hou heel veel van je"
  translation="–Ø –æ—á–µ–Ω—å —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ —Ö–∞—É —Ö–µ–π–ª —Ñ–µ–π–ª –≤–∞–Ω –π–µ"
  example="Ik hou heel veel van je, schat."
/>

### "–Ø –ª—é–±–ª—é —Ç–µ–±—è –≤—Å–µ–º —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ–º"

<VocabCard
  word="Ik hou van je met heel mijn hart"
  translation="–Ø –ª—é–±–ª—é —Ç–µ–±—è –≤—Å–µ–º —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ–º"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ —Ö–∞—É –≤–∞–Ω –π–µ –º–µ—Ç —Ö–µ–π–ª –º–µ–π–Ω —Ö–∞—Ä—Ç"
  example="Ik hou van je met heel mijn hart, voor altijd."
/>

### "–¢—ã ‚Äî –º–æ—ë –≤—Å—ë"

<VocabCard
  word="Je bent mijn alles"
  translation="–¢—ã ‚Äî –º–æ—ë –≤—Å—ë"
  pronunciation="–π–µ –±–µ–Ω—Ç –º–µ–π–Ω –∞–ª–µ—Å"
  example="Je bent mijn alles, lieverd."
/>

### "–Ø –±–µ–∑ —É–º–∞ –æ—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è"

<VocabCard
  word="Ik ben gek op je"
  translation="–Ø –±–µ–∑ —É–º–∞ –æ—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ –±–µ–Ω —Ö–µ–∫ –æ–ø –π–µ"
  example="Ik ben zo gek op je, weet je dat?"
/>

<CultureTip title="–ù–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∞—è —Å–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å" flag="üá≥üá±">
–ù–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Ü—ã –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã —Å–≤–æ–µ–π –ø—Ä—è–º–æ—Ç–æ–π, –Ω–æ –≤ –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å —Å–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤–∞—à –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç "Ik hou van je" ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ –∏ –∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ. –û–Ω–∏ –Ω–µ –±—Ä–æ—Å–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏!
</CultureTip>

## –î—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±—ã –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∑–∏—Ç—å –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å

<VocabCard
  word="Ik aanbid je"
  translation="–Ø –æ–±–æ–∂–∞—é —Ç–µ–±—è"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ –∞–Ω–±–∏—Ç –π–µ"
  example="Ik aanbid je, mijn schat."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ik kan niet zonder je"
  translation="–Ø –Ω–µ –º–æ–≥—É –±–µ–∑ —Ç–µ–±—è"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ –∫–∞–Ω –Ω–∏—Ç –∑–æ–Ω–¥–µ—Ä –π–µ"
  example="Ik kan niet zonder je, je bent mijn leven."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Je bent de liefde van mijn leven"
  translation="–¢—ã ‚Äî –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å –≤—Å–µ–π –º–æ–µ–π –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏"
  pronunciation="–π–µ –±–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–µ –ª–∏—Ñ–¥–µ –≤–∞–Ω –º–µ–π–Ω –ª–µ–≤–µ–Ω"
  example="Je bent de liefde van mijn leven en dat zal altijd zo blijven."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ik ben verliefd op je"
  translation="–Ø –≤–ª—é–±–ª—ë–Ω/–≤–ª—é–±–ª–µ–Ω–∞ –≤ —Ç–µ–±—è"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ –±–µ–Ω —Ñ–µ—Ä–ª–∏—Ñ—Ç –æ–ø –π–µ"
  example="Ik ben zo verliefd op je."
/>

## –õ–∞—Å–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –æ–±—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è

| –ù–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏–π | –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π | –ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å |
|---------------|---------|-------------------|
| Schat | –°–æ–∫—Ä–æ–≤–∏—â–µ | –ö–ª–∞—Å—Å–∏–∫–∞, –æ—á–µ–Ω—å —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–æ |
| Lieverd | –î–æ—Ä–æ–≥–æ–π/–î–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∞—è | –ù–µ–∂–Ω–æ, –ø–æ–≤—Å–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ |
| Liefje | –õ—é–±–∏–º—ã–π/–õ—é–±–∏–º–∞—è | –õ–∞—Å–∫–æ–≤–æ |
| Mijn liefde | –ú–æ—è –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å | –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ |
| Snoepje | –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ç–∫–∞ | –ú–∏–ª–æ, –ª–∞—Å–∫–æ–≤–æ |

> **–°–æ–≤–µ—Ç:** "Ik hou van je, schat" (–Ø –ª—é–±–ª—é —Ç–µ–±—è, —Å–æ–∫—Ä–æ–≤–∏—â–µ) ‚Äî –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –µ—Å—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∑–≤—É—á–∏—Ç –¥–ª—è –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø–∞—Ä.

## –ü—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ –≤–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ

<VocabCard
  word="Ik ben verliefd op je geworden"
  translation="–Ø –≤–ª—é–±–∏–ª—Å—è/–≤–ª—é–±–∏–ª–∞—Å—å –≤ —Ç–µ–±—è"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ –±–µ–Ω —Ñ–µ—Ä–ª–∏—Ñ—Ç –æ–ø –π–µ —Ö–µ–≤–æ—Ä–¥–µ–Ω"
  example="Ik ben verliefd op je geworden vanaf het eerste moment."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ik voel iets speciaals voor je"
  translation="–Ø —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤—É—é –∫ —Ç–µ–±–µ —á—Ç–æ-—Ç–æ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ"
  pronunciation="–∏–∫ —Ñ—É–ª –∏—Ç—Å —Å–ø–µ—Å—å—è–ª—Å —Ñ–æ—Ä –π–µ"
  example="Ik voel iets speciaals voor je, ik denk dat ik verliefd ben."
/>

## –ö—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–∞—è —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–æ—á–Ω–∞—è –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∞

| –§—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ó–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ò–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Å–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å |
|-------|----------|---------------|
| Ik hou van je | –Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é | –°—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–∞—è |
| Ik hou heel veel van je | –Ø –æ—á–µ–Ω—å —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é | –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Å–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è |
| Ik hou van je met heel mijn hart | –Ø –ª—é–±–ª—é —Ç–µ–±—è –≤—Å–µ–º —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ–º | –û—á–µ–Ω—å —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∞—è |
| Ik ben gek op je | –Ø –±–µ–∑ —É–º–∞ –æ—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è | –°—Ç—Ä–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è |
| Ik aanbid je | –Ø –æ–±–æ–∂–∞—é —Ç–µ–±—è | –ì–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∞—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å |
| Ik ben verliefd op je | –Ø –≤–ª—é–±–ª—ë–Ω –≤ —Ç–µ–±—è | –ò–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è |

## –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ ‚Äî –ø—É—Ç—å –∫ —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω—Å—Ç–≤—É

–õ—É—á—à–∏–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–± –≤—ã—É—á–∏—Ç—å —ç—Ç–∏ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã ‚Äî –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö –∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ. –ù–∞—á–Ω–∏—Ç–µ —Å **Ik hou van je** –∏ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—å—Ç–µ –≤–∞—à–µ–º—É –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä—É —É—Å–ª—ã—à–∞—Ç—å —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–∞ –µ–≥–æ —Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–µ. –ù–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Ü—ã —Ü–µ–Ω—è—Ç –∏—Å–∫—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å ‚Äî –¥–∞–∂–µ –µ—Å–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ –∏–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ, –≤–∞—à–∏ —É—Å–∏–ª–∏—è –±—É–¥—É—Ç –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–µ–Ω—ã.


## –ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–ª–∂–∏—Ç—å –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ

- **[–†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã](/learn/ru/nl/dutch-romantic-phrases-every-occasion/)** - –ù–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–ª—É—á–∞–π
- **[–õ–∞—Å–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–∑–≤–∏—â–∞](/learn/ru/nl/dutch-pet-names-terms-of-endearment/)** - –ù–µ–∂–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞
- **[–°–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ä—å –¥–ª—è —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è](/learn/ru/nl/dutch-date-night-vocabulary/)** - –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä
- **[–ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ](/learn/ru/nl/dutch-pronunciation-guide/)** - –û—Å–≤–æ–π—Ç–µ –∑–≤—É–∫–∏

<CTA
  text="–ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –∏–∑—É—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∏–¥–µ—Ä–ª–∞–Ω–¥—Å–∫–∏–π –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ?"
  buttonText="–ù–∞—á–∞—Ç—å –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å"
/>

articles.title: 50+ Rumence Sevgi S√∂zc√ºƒü√º: Romantizmi Ke≈üfedin
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Her dilde olduƒüu gibi, Rumence'de de sevdiklerimize hitap etmek i√ßin kullandƒ±ƒüƒ±mƒ±z √∂zel, tatlƒ± kelimeler vardƒ±r. Bu sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri, ili≈ükilere sƒ±caklƒ±k katar ve partnerinize ne kadar deƒüerli olduƒüunu g√∂sterir.

T√ºrk√ße'de "canƒ±m", "a≈ükƒ±m", "tatlƒ±m" gibi ifadeler kullandƒ±ƒüƒ±mƒ±z gibi, Rumenler de zengin bir sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√º koleksiyonuna sahiptir.

## En Yaygƒ±n Rumence Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Dragostea mea"
  translation="A≈ükƒ±m"
  pronunciation="dra-gos-tea mea"
  context="En klasik ve yaygƒ±n sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√º - her zaman kullanabilirsiniz"
/>

### Temel Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri

<VocabCard
  word="Iubirea mea"
  translation="A≈ükƒ±m / Sevgilim"
  pronunciation="yu-bi-rea mea"
  example="BunƒÉ diminea»õa, iubirea mea!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Sufletul meu"
  translation="Ruhum / Canƒ±m"
  pronunciation="su-fle-tul meu"
  example="Te a»ôtept, sufletul meu."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Inima mea"
  translation="Kalbim"
  pronunciation="i-ni-ma mea"
  example="E»ôti totul pentru mine, inima mea."
/>

## Tatlƒ± ve ≈ûirin Hitap ≈ûekilleri

Rumenler, √∂zellikle sevdiklerine hitap ederken k√º√ß√ºltme ekleri kullanmayƒ± √ßok severler:

<VocabCard
  word="Puiule / Pui»ôor"
  translation="Yavrum / Civcivim"
  pronunciation="pu-yu-le / pu-i-shor"
  example="Vino aici, puiule!"
/>

| Rumence | Okunu≈üu | T√ºrk√ße | Kullanƒ±m |
|---------|---------|--------|----------|
| **DrƒÉgu»õule/DrƒÉgu»õo** | dra-gu-tsu-le/dra-gu-tso | Tatlƒ±m | Erkek/Kadƒ±n i√ßin |
| **Scumpule/Scumpo** | skum-pu-le/skum-po | Kƒ±ymetlim | Erkek/Kadƒ±n i√ßin |
| **Dulcea»õa mea** | dul-cha-tsa mea | Tatlƒ±lƒ±ƒüƒ±m | Kadƒ±n partnere |
| **Frumoaso** | fru-moa-so | G√ºzelim | Kadƒ±n partnere |
| **Dragule** | dra-gu-le | Sevgilim | Erkek partnere |

<CultureTip title="Cinsiyet Uyumu" flag="üá∑üá¥">
Rumence'de √ßoƒüu sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√º, hitap ettiƒüiniz ki≈üinin cinsiyetine g√∂re deƒüi≈üir. "-ul/-ule" ekleri erkekler i√ßin, "-a/-o" ekleri kadƒ±nlar i√ßin kullanƒ±lƒ±r. Bu, T√ºrk√ße'den farklƒ± bir √∂zelliktir!
</CultureTip>

## Hayvan Temalƒ± Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri

T√ºrk√ße'de olduƒüu gibi, Rumence'de de hayvan isimleri sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√º olarak kullanƒ±lƒ±r:

<VocabCard
  word="Pisicu»õƒÉ"
  translation="Kedicik"
  pronunciation="pi-si-ku-tsa"
  example="Pisicu»õa mea dragƒÉ, te iubesc!"
/>

| Rumence | Okunu≈üu | T√ºrk√ße |
|---------|---------|--------|
| **Ursule»õul meu** | ur-su-le-tsul meu | Ayƒ±cƒ±ƒüƒ±m |
| **Iepura»ôul meu** | ye-pu-ra-shul meu | Tav≈üancƒ±ƒüƒ±m |
| **PƒÉsƒÉrica mea** | pa-sa-ri-ka mea | Ku≈üum |
| **Porumbel/Porumbi»õa** | po-rum-bel/po-rum-bi-tsa | G√ºvercinim |

## Romantik ve ≈ûiirsel ƒ∞fadeler

Rumen k√ºlt√ºr√º ≈üiir ve romantizmle doludur. ƒ∞≈üte bazƒ± ≈üiirsel sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri:

<VocabCard
  word="Steaua mea"
  translation="Yƒ±ldƒ±zƒ±m"
  pronunciation="stea-ua mea"
  example="E»ôti steaua mea cƒÉlƒÉuzitoare."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Soarele meu"
  translation="G√ºne≈üim"
  pronunciation="soa-re-le meu"
  example="BunƒÉ diminea»õa, soarele meu!"
/>

### Daha Fazla ≈ûiirsel ƒ∞fade

- **"Luna mea"** [lu-na mea] (Ayƒ±m)
- **"Comoara mea"** [ko-moa-ra mea] (Hazinem)
- **"√éngera»ôul meu"** [ƒ±n-ge-ra-shul meu] (Meleƒüim)
- **"Prin»õul meu/Prin»õesa mea"** [prin-tsul meu/prin-tse-sa mea] (Prensim/Prensesim)

<CultureTip title="Rumen ≈ûiir Geleneƒüi" flag="üá∑üá¥">
Romanya, Mihai Eminescu gibi b√ºy√ºk romantik ≈üairlerin √ºlkesidir. Rumen sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri bu zengin edebi gelenekten etkilenmi≈ütir. Eminescu'nun "»òi dacƒÉ..." (Ve eƒüer...) ≈üiiri, Rumence'nin en g√ºzel a≈ük ifadelerinden bazƒ±larƒ±nƒ± i√ßerir.
</CultureTip>

## G√ºnl√ºk Hayatta Kullanƒ±m

### Sabah ƒ∞fadeleri

| Rumence | T√ºrk√ße |
|---------|--------|
| **BunƒÉ diminea»õa, dragostea mea!** | G√ºnaydƒ±n, a≈ükƒ±m! |
| **Cum ai dormit, puiule?** | Nasƒ±l uyudun, yavrum? |
| **Te iubesc, soarele meu!** | Seni seviyorum, g√ºne≈üim! |

### G√ºn ƒ∞√ßi Mesajlarƒ±

- **"√é»õi scriu sƒÉ-»õi spun cƒÉ te iubesc, sufletul meu"** (Seni sevdiƒüimi s√∂ylemek i√ßin yazƒ±yorum, canƒ±m)
- **"MƒÉ g√¢ndesc la tine, drƒÉgu»õo"** (Seni d√º≈ü√ºn√ºyorum, tatlƒ±m)
- **"Abia a»ôtept sƒÉ te vƒÉd, inima mea"** (Seni g√∂rmek i√ßin sabƒ±rsƒ±zlanƒ±yorum, kalbim)

### Ak≈üam ƒ∞fadeleri

- **"Noapte bunƒÉ, iubirea mea"** [noa-pte bu-na, yu-bi-rea mea] (ƒ∞yi geceler, a≈ükƒ±m)
- **"Vise frumoase, √Ængera»ôul meu"** [vi-se fru-moa-se, ƒ±n-ge-ra-shul meu] (Tatlƒ± r√ºyalar, meleƒüim)

## Sevgi S√∂zc√ºklerini G√º√ßlendirme

Rumence'de sevgi s√∂zc√ºklerini daha da g√º√ßlendirmek i√ßin kullanƒ±lan kelimeler:

| Rumence | T√ºrk√ße | √ñrnek |
|---------|--------|-------|
| **Scump/ScumpƒÉ** | Sevgili/Deƒüerli | Scumpul meu so»õ (Sevgili kocam) |
| **Drag/DragƒÉ** | Sevgili | Draga mea so»õie (Sevgili karƒ±m) |
| **Frumos/FrumoasƒÉ** | G√ºzel | Frumoasa mea (G√ºzelim) |

## Pratik ƒ∞pu√ßlarƒ±

### Telaffuz ƒ∞pu√ßlarƒ±

1. **"»ö" harfi**: "ts" gibi okunur
2. **"»ò" harfi**: "≈ü" gibi okunur
3. **"ƒÇ" harfi**: Belirsiz bir "a" sesi
4. **Vurgu**: Genellikle sondan bir √∂nceki hecede

### Ne Zaman Hangi ƒ∞fadeyi Kullanmalƒ±

- **Resmi olmayan, samimi anlar**: "Puiule", "DrƒÉgu»õo"
- **Romantik anlar**: "Dragostea mea", "Sufletul meu"
- **G√ºnl√ºk ileti≈üim**: "Iubirea mea", "Scumpo"

<CultureTip title="Rumen Ailelerinde Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri" flag="üá∑üá¥">
Rumen ailelerinde sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri sadece √ßiftler arasƒ±nda deƒüil, aile √ºyeleri arasƒ±nda da yaygƒ±n kullanƒ±lƒ±r. Anneler √ßocuklarƒ±na "puiul mamei" (annemin yavrusu), b√ºy√ºkanneler torunlarƒ±na "sufletul bunicii" (b√ºy√ºkannenin canƒ±) diyebilir.
</CultureTip>

## √ñƒürenme Aktiviteleri

### G√ºnl√ºk Pratik
Her g√ºn partnerinize farklƒ± bir Rumence sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√ºyle hitap edin. Bir hafta boyunca her g√ºn yeni bir ifade deneyin.

### Sevgi Notlarƒ±
K√º√ß√ºk kaƒüƒ±tlara Rumence sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri yazƒ±p partnerinizin bulabileceƒüi yerlere bƒ±rakƒ±n.

### Birlikte Telaffuz
Ak≈üamlarƒ± birlikte be≈ü dakika Rumence sevgi s√∂zc√ºklerinin telaffuzunu pratik yapƒ±n.

Bu tatlƒ± Rumence ifadeleri kullanarak partnerinizle olan ileti≈üiminize yeni bir boyut katabilirsiniz. Her "Dragostea mea" veya "Te iubesc, sufletul meu" dediƒüinizde, ili≈ükinizi zenginle≈ütirirken yeni bir dil de √∂ƒüreniyorsunuz.

## √ñƒürenmeye Devam Et

- **[Rumence Telaffuz](/learn/tr/ro/romanian-pronunciation-guide/)** - Sesleri √∂ƒürenin
- **[Temel Rumence ƒ∞fadeler](/learn/tr/ro/romanian-essential-phrases-for-couples/)** - Pratik ileti≈üim
- **[Rumence Zor mu?](/learn/tr/ro/is-romanian-hard-to-learn/)** - D√ºr√ºst analiz
- **[Rumence Selamla≈ümalar](/learn/tr/ro/romanian-greetings-farewells/)** - Temel konu≈üma

<CTA
  text="Rumen partnerinizle pratik yapmaya hazƒ±r mƒ±sƒ±nƒ±z? Love Languages ile AI sesli sohbet sayesinde 'dragostea mea' ve 'iubirea mea' gibi kelimelerin telaffuzunu m√ºkemmelle≈ütirebilirsiniz - yargƒ±lanma korkusu olmadan. Partneriniz size Kelime Hediyesi olarak sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri g√∂nderebilir ve √∂ƒüretmen rol√ºyle ilerlemenizi takip edebilir."
  buttonText="Rumenceyi Birlikte √ñƒürenin"
/>

articles.title: Lengyel kifejez√©sek f√©lt√©kenys√©ghez √©s bizalomhoz
articles.content:
A lengyel kult√∫r√°ban az √©rzelmek m√©lyek √©s ≈ëszint√©k. Ha lengyel anyanyelv≈± partnered van, ezek a kifejez√©sek seg√≠tenek a f√©lt√©kenys√©g kezel√©s√©ben.

## Kifejez√©sek a f√©lt√©kenys√©ghez

### 1. "Jestem zazdrosny/zazdrosna, kiedy ty..."
**Kiejt√©s:** Jesztem zazdroszn·ªâ/zazdroszn√†, kjedi ti

### 3. "Ufam ci, ale zmagam siƒô z uczuciami"

### 4. "Mo≈ºemy porozmawiaƒá o tym, co siƒô sta≈Ço?"
**Kiejt√©s:** Mozsemi porozmaviacs o tim, co si√© sztauo

**Jelent√©s:** Besz√©lhet√ºnk arr√≥l, ami t√∂rt√©nt?

**P√©lda:** "Widzia≈Çam, jak rozmawiasz z by≈ÇƒÖ. Mo≈ºemy o tym porozmawiaƒá?"

### 5. "Nie chcƒô byƒá zazdrosny/a, ale..."
**Kiejt√©s:** ≈áe hc√© bics zazdroszn·ªâ/a, ale

**Jelent√©s:** Nem akarok f√©lt√©keny lenni, de...

**P√©lda:** "Nie chcƒô byƒá zazdrosna, ale czu≈Çam siƒô nieswojo."

### 6. "Ufam ci ca≈Çkowicie"
**Kiejt√©s:** Ufam csi caukovicse

**Jelent√©s:** Teljesen megb√≠zom benned

**P√©lda:** "Chcƒô, ≈ºeby≈õ wiedzia≈Ça, ≈ºe ufam ci ca≈Çkowicie."

### 7. "Jeste≈õ jedynƒÖ osobƒÖ dla mnie"
**Kiejt√©s:** Jesztesz jedinon oszobon dla m≈àe

**Jelent√©s:** Te vagy az egyetlen nekem

**P√©lda:** "Niewa≈ºne z kim rozmawiam, jeste≈õ jedynƒÖ dla mnie."

### 8. "Nigdy nie zrobi≈Çbym czego≈õ, co by ciƒô zrani≈Ço"
**Kiejt√©s:** ≈áigdi ≈àe zrobiubim csegosz, co bi csi√© zra≈àiuo

**Jelent√©s:** Soha nem tenn√©k olyat, ami f√°jna neked

**P√©lda:** "Uwierz mi, nigdy nie zrobi≈Çabym czego≈õ, co by ciƒô zrani≈Ço."

### 9. "Miƒôdzy nami nic nie ma"
**Kiejt√©s:** Mjendzi nami ≈àic ≈àe ma

**P√©lda:** "To tylko przyjaci√≥≈Çka. Miƒôdzy nami nic nie ma."

### 10. "Jestem ci wierny/a"
**Kiejt√©s:** Jesztem csi vjern√≠/a

**Jelent√©s:** H≈± vagyok hozz√°d

**P√©lda:** "Jestem ci ca≈Çkowicie wierna i zawsze bƒôdƒô."

### 11. "BƒÖd≈∫my szczerzy wobec siebie"
**Kiejt√©s:** Bondzsm√≠ stsersz√≠ vobec siebie

**Jelent√©s:** Legy√ºnk ≈ëszint√©k egym√°ssal

**P√©lda:** "≈ªeby uniknƒÖƒá nieporozumie≈Ñ, bƒÖd≈∫my szczerzy wobec siebie."

### 12. "Nie chcƒô, ≈ºeby zazdro≈õƒá nas rozdzieli≈Ça"
**Kiejt√©s:** ≈áe hc√©, zsebi zazdroscs nasz rozdzseliua

**P√©lda:** "Kocham ciƒô za bardzo. Nie chcƒô, ≈ºeby zazdro≈õƒá nas rozdzieli≈Ça."

## √ñsszefoglal√°s

A lengyel-magyar bar√°ts√°g √©rt√©kei a p√°rkapcsolatban is seg√≠tenek a meg√©rt√©sben.

articles.title: Portugese SMS-Taal voor Stellen: Lieve Berichtjes Sturen
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Wil je je Portugese partner verrassen met schattige berichtjes? Met deze sms-taal en afkortingen chat je als een echte Portugees!

## Populaire Afkortingen

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Tou c/ sdds"
  translation="Ik mis je (Estou com saudades)"
  pronunciation="esh-TOH kom sow-DA-desh"
  context="De romantische afkorting die je vaak zult zien!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Bjs / Bjnhs"
  translation="Kusjes / Kusjes (beijinhos)"
  pronunciation="bay-ZHEE-nyoosh"
  example="At√© logo! Bjs! üòò"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Tb / Tbm"
  translation="Ook (tamb√©m)"
  pronunciation="tam-BENG"
  example="Eu tb te amo! ‚ù§Ô∏è"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Pq / Pq√™"
  translation="Waarom / Omdat (porque)"
  pronunciation="por-KE"
  example="Pq n√£o vieste? Tava √† tua espera!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Qd / Qdo"
  translation="Wanneer (quando)"
  pronunciation="KWAN-do"
  example="Qd vamos sair? Tou c/ sdds!"
/>

<CultureTip title="Portugal vs. Brazili√´" flag="üáµüáπüáßüá∑">
SMS-taal verschilt! In Brazili√´ zie je meer "vc" (voc√™) terwijl Portugal "tu" gebruikt. Beide zijn prima!
</CultureTip>

## Liefdesberichtjes

<VocabCard
  word="Amo-te mt ‚ù§Ô∏è"
  translation="Ik hou heel veel van je"
  pronunciation="AH-mo-te MWEEN-to"
  example="Amo-te mt mt mt! √âs tudo para mim!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Tou a pensar em ti"
  translation="Ik denk aan je"
  pronunciation="toh a pen-SAR eng tee"
  example="Reuni√£o chata... tou a pensar em ti! üí≠"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="√âs o/a melhor"
  translation="Jij bent de beste"
  pronunciation="esh oo/a me-LYOR"
  example="√âs a melhor, amor! üíï"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="N consigo parar de pensar em ti"
  translation="Ik kan niet stoppen met aan je denken"
  pronunciation="nowng kon-SEE-go pa-RAR de pen-SAR eng tee"
  example="N consigo parar de pensar em ti... volta logo! ü•∫"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Abra√ßo"
  translation="Knuffel"
  pronunciation="a-BRA-so"
  example="Um grande abra√ßo! ü§ó"
/>

## Dagelijkse Berichten

<VocabCard
  word="Bom dia amor!"
  translation="Goedemorgen liefje!"
  pronunciation="bom DEE-a a-MOR"
  example="Bom dia amor! Dormiste bem? ‚òÄÔ∏è"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Boa noite, bjs"
  translation="Goedenacht, kusjes"
  pronunciation="BOH-a NOY-te bay-ZHOOSH"
  example="Boa noite amor, bjs! Sonha cmg! üí§"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="T√°s onde?"
  translation="Waar ben je?"
  pronunciation="tash ON-de"
  example="T√°s onde? J√° cheguei!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="J√° vou"
  translation="Ik kom eraan"
  pronunciation="zha voh"
  example="J√° vou! 5 min! üèÉ"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Dps"
  translation="Later (depois)"
  pronunciation="de-POYSH"
  example="Falo ctg dps! Tou ocupada."
/>

## Afspraken Maken

<VocabCard
  word="Vamos sair?"
  translation="Zullen we uitgaan?"
  pronunciation="VA-moosh sa-EER"
  example="Vamos sair hj √† noite? üç∑"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Onde e qd?"
  translation="Waar en wanneer?"
  pronunciation="ON-de ee KWAN-do"
  example="Vamos! Onde e qd?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="T√°s em casa?"
  translation="Ben je thuis?"
  pronunciation="tash eng KA-za"
  example="T√°s em casa? Vou a√≠!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Tou a caminho"
  translation="Ik ben onderweg"
  pronunciation="toh a ka-MEE-nyo"
  example="Tou a caminho! Espera por mim!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Chego j√°"
  translation="Ik ben er zo"
  pronunciation="SHE-go zha"
  example="Chego j√°! Quase a√≠!"
/>

<CultureTip title="Hj = Hoje" flag="üìÖ">
"Hj" betekent "hoje" (vandaag). Je ziet ook "amanh" voor "amanh√£" (morgen) en "ont" voor "ontem" (gisteren).
</CultureTip>

## Emoji's en Reacties

### Populaire Combinaties

| Emoji | Portugese Context |
|-------|------------------|
| ‚ù§Ô∏è | Amo-te / Te amo |
| üòò | Bjs / Beijinhos |
| ü•∞ | Amor / Querido(a) |
| üíï | N√≥s dois |
| ü§ó | Abra√ßo |
| üòä | Tudo bem |
| üáµüáπ | Nationale trots |

<VocabCard
  word="üòò Beijinho"
  translation="Kusje"
  pronunciation="bay-ZHEE-nyo"
  example="Bom dia! Beijinho! üòòüòò"
/>

## Grappige Reacties

<VocabCard
  word="Haha / kkkk"
  translation="Haha"
  pronunciation="ha-ha / ka-ka-ka-ka"
  example="Haha isso foi hil√°rio! üòÇ"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ahahah que fixe!"
  translation="Haha wat cool!"
  pronunciation="a-ha-ha ke FEESH"
  example="Ahahah que fixe! ü§£"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Q fofo!"
  translation="Wat schattig!"
  pronunciation="ke FO-fo"
  example="Q fofo! Adoro! ü•∫"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="N acredito!"
  translation="Ik geloof het niet!"
  pronunciation="nowng a-kre-DEE-to"
  example="N acredito! A s√©rio?! üò±"
/>

<CultureTip title="kkkk vs. haha" flag="üòÇ">
"kkkk" is Braziliaans voor lachen (het 'k' geluid). In Portugal gebruik je meer "haha" of "ahahah". Beide worden begrepen!
</CultureTip>

## Zoete Koosnaampjes (SMS-versie)

| Portugees | Nederlands |
|-----------|------------|
| Amor | Liefje |
| B√©b√© | Baby |
| Querido/a | Lieverd |
| Meu bem | Mijn liefste |
| Meu amor | Mijn liefde |
| Cora√ß√£o | Hartje |
| Princesa/Pr√≠ncipe | Prinses/Prins |

<VocabCard
  word="Ol√° amor!"
  translation="Hoi liefje!"
  pronunciation="o-LA a-MOR"
  example="Ol√° amor! Tudo bem ctg?"
/>

## Bevestigingen

<VocabCard
  word="Sim! / Ya!"
  translation="Ja!"
  pronunciation="seeng / ya"
  example="Sim! Bora l√°!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ok / T√°"
  translation="Ok√©"
  pronunciation="oh-KAY / ta"
  example="T√° amor, at√© logo!"
/>

<VocabCard
